name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PlusMind + ChatGPT quiz creator for Canvas

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quiz creator transfers quiz output from PlusMind website and ChatGPT to Canvas LMS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows transferring quizzes from ChatGPT and PlusMind website to Canvas learning management system (LMS).
